p: As an independent approach to refine this chronology, we use measured horizontal surface flow velocities 13, to derive age estimates of: Mullins ASD:ASD1: 10–13 ka, ASD2: 24–42 ka, ASD3: 41–72 ka, ASD4: 91–105 ka, ASD5: 130–175, ASD6: 196–290 ka. Friedman ASD:ASD1: 10–14 ka, ASD2: 22–55 ka, ASD3: 26–67 ka, ASD4: 37–80 ka, ASD5: 78–130, ASD6: 131–198 ka.
